root: ^You’re heading out early, hey? What’s on your mind, my child? School? The streets? You need to focus and make the right choices. I know life out there isn’t easy, but you have to remember that every decision you make counts.

s: ^Yeah, I’m going to school, Gran. I’m trying to focus.
^The streets are calling, Gran. I’ll be back later.

School_Focus: ^That’s good. You’ve always been a smart one. I’ve seen you put your head down and work, but sometimes life throws distractions in your way. What do you do when things get tough at school?

s: ^I push through. I’m not letting anything stop me from learning.
^I don’t know, Gran. Sometimes it feels like too much.

Push_Through: ^That’s what I love to hear. School’s hard, but it’s your way out of here, your way to a better life. I didn’t have the same opportunities you do now, but I know you’re going to make something of yourself. Keep your eyes on your future.
Feels_Like_Too_Much: ^It’s okay to feel that way. We all do. The important thing is that you don’t let that feeling stop you. What do you think you need to help you stay on track?

s: ^I think I just need to get my head clear.

Tutor_Help: ^Just remember, you’re not alone in this. I’m here for you. Even when things get tough, I’m here to support you.
Head_Clear: ^Just remember, you’re not alone in this. I’m here for you. Even when things get tough, I’m here to support you.
Streets_Calling: ^You think the streets care about you? The streets only take. I know you think you’ve got it figured out, but you’re playing a dangerous game. What do you think is out there for you?

s: ^I’ve got to make my own way, Gran. No one’s handing me anything.
^I don’t know if I can handle it all.

Make_Own_Way: ^Your own way? I understand that, but you need to think about the long term. The streets will swallow you whole if you’re not careful. Do you think they care about your future?

s: ^I can handle it, Gran. I’ve been through worse.
^Maybe you’re right, but it feels like the only option sometimes.

Can_Handle: ^The streets can seem like a quick way, but they come with their own costs. You’re worth more than what they offer.
Dont_Know_If_Handle: ^It’s okay to feel unsure, but you can’t let doubt control your path. Sometimes, taking a step back to reassess things can make a big difference.

s: ^Maybe I need to go to the Community Center and clear my head.

Not_Sure_What_To_Do: ^It’s okay not to have all the answers. You’re still figuring things out. But you need to start making decisions, otherwise, the world will make them for you.

s: ^Maybe I need to visit the Community Center for some guidance.

Start_Community_Center_Quest: ^I think that’s a good idea. The people there might be able to give you a different perspective. Go and see what they have to say at the Community Center.
Feels_Only_Option: ^I get that. The world can feel like it’s closing in on you. But you’ve got to know that there are other ways, even if they’re harder to see.

s: ^I want a better life, I just don’t know how to get there.
^I don’t know. I’m just taking it one day at a time.

Just_Survive: ^Survival is a start, but there’s more to life than just surviving. You have a chance to build something for yourself. Don't lose sight of that.
Better_Life: ^I’m glad to hear that. You don’t need to have it all figured out, but having a goal can help guide your choices.
One_Day_At_A_Time: ^You say that, but every day you don’t make a choice, the world makes one for you. You can’t afford to drift, my child. What’s stopping you from making a decision now?

s: ^I’m scared of making the wrong choice.
^I don’t want to feel trapped by one path.

Scared_Of_Failure: ^That’s understandable. Everyone’s afraid of failure. But making no decision is the same as making the wrong one. You need to face that fear.

s: ^I guess you’re right. I’ll think about it.

Think_About_It: ^I’m glad you’re open to it. Life is about making choices, even the hard ones.
Trapped_By_Path: ^I get that. But sometimes committing to a path, even if it feels limiting, is what gives you freedom later. You have to sacrifice some things to gain others.
